meta.job_title: Clinical Assistant Professor in Anesthesia and Pain Management

duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead teaching, clinical, and research activities in the field of Anesthesia and Pain Management within the Veterinary Medicine department.
Train and mentor veterinary medical residents, interns, and students in didactic, laboratory, and clinical settings.
Manage and provide oversight for anesthetic cases across a busy veterinary hospital, ensuring high-quality care for small, large, and exotic animals.
Encourage and engage in independent research, with a focus on training opportunities for veterinary residents, interns, and students.

education_certification.credential: Doctor of Veterinary Medicine (DVM) or equivalent degree, Board Certification in Veterinary Anesthesia and Analgesia preferred
